content: Hello, I am new here. I would like to contribute. Someone please help.
Welcome! What sort of contributions are you interested in?

@Amandeep Singh I recommend to start with reading through the documentation at https://brlcad.org/wiki/Main_Page, to perform some exercises as downloading the code from our subversion repository and compiling it, and to solve some tasks from https://brlcad.org/wiki/Deuces.
